description: Cozy up with a gingerbread scone, full of spicy goodness and a touch of sweetness. Perfect for a winter treat.
Moist and tender lemon blueberry scones bursting with juicy berries and a hint of tangy lemon. Perfect for a sweet breakfast or snack.
Enjoy a relaxing wild blueberry and custard teatime with sweet and juicy berries and rich, creamy custard. Perfect for a cozy afternoon treat.
A loaf of our Italian herb bread is packed with flavor from a blend of savory herbs and spices. Perfect for dipping or enjoying with your favorite meal.
Authentic Italian ciabatta bread, made with high-quality flour and extra virgin olive oil. Perfect for dipping or enjoying with your favorite meal.
Indulge in a rich and flaky chocolate croissant, made with layers of buttery dough and rich chocolate. Perfect for a decadent breakfast or snack.
Try our delicious croissants, made with layers of buttery dough and baked to perfection. Perfect for breakfast, lunch, or as a snack.
Indulge in our delicious cinnamon buns, made with a rich, buttery dough and a generous helping of cinnamon and sugar. Perfect for a sweet breakfast or dessert.
Satisfy your chocolate cravings with our double chocolate scones. Moist, with chunks of rich chocolate in every bite. Perfect for a sweet breakfast or snack.
Indulge in our delicious cinnamon scones, made with a rich, buttery dough and a generous helping of cinnamon and sugar. Perfect for a sweet breakfast or snack.
Enjoy a delicious blueberry custard danish, made with a flaky pastry crust and filled with juicy blueberries and rich, creamy custard. Perfect for a sweet breakfast or snack.
Try our delicious raspberry custard danish, filled with juicy raspberries and rich, creamy custard. Wrapped in a flaky pastry crust for the perfect sweet treat.
Treat yourself to a delicious apple danish, made with a flaky pastry crust and filled with tender, spiced apples. Perfect for a sweet breakfast or snack.
Indulge in a savory ham and cheese bun, made with a rich, buttery dough and filled with slices of ham and melted cheese. Perfect for a satisfying breakfast or snack.
Try our delicious spinach and feta croissant, made with layers of buttery dough and filled with a savory mixture of spinach and feta cheese. Perfect for a satisfying breakfast or snack.
Enjoy a tasty Hawaiian mini pizza, made with a crispy crust and topped with a delicious combination of ham, pineapple, and melted cheese. Perfect for a quick and satisfying snack.
Treat yourself to a delicious apple danish, made with a flaky pastry crust and filled with tender, spiced apples. Perfect for a sweet breakfast or snack.
Spicy jalapenos and gooey cheese twisted together in a mouthwatering snack. Perfect for satisfying your cravings.
A crispy, crunchy treat made with puffed rice and melted marshmallows. The perfect dessert for satisfying your sweet tooth.
Delicious layers of chocolate, caramel, and pecans create the perfect combination of sweet and salty in these tasty turtle bars. A must-try for any chocolate lover.
Rich, fudgy brownies with a hint of peppermint. The perfect dessert for the holiday season.
A simple but delicious treat, these shortbread cookies are made with just a few ingredients and are the perfect balance of buttery and crumbly. Perfect for dipping in tea or coffee.
A festive holiday treat, these gingerbread cookies are flavored with warm spices and are perfect for decorating and sharing with friends and family. A must-try for any gingerbread lover.
